page.title: 14FORTS GILKICKER & MONCKTON
page.content: Fort Gilkicker was built in or around 1850 and up the top is a cannon. They sometimes fire it when there is a Royal Celebration. They built it on a beach so that they could see the enemy's attacks from boats. There is a marsh around Fort Gilkicker so nobody could reach it on the north,east and west sides. Fort Monckton is also built up by the sea to protect Portsmouth Harbour. It is much bigger and commands a more defensive position. Now it is used for keeping various Council machinery. Both of these Forts are government property and are maintained by the Ministry of Defence.
